meanings.sent1: The curious questioners in the classroom raised their hands eagerly.
meanings.sent2: The journalist interviewed the questioners at the town hall meeting.
meanings.sent3: The little questioners at the library kept the librarian on their toes.
meanings.sent4: The detective relied on the questioners to uncover the truth.
meanings.sent5: The young questioners were like sponges, absorbing knowledge from their surroundings.

meanings.definition: Those who inquire or seek information.
meanings.sent1: The questioners at the information desk were very helpful.
meanings.sent2: The survey was sent out to all potential questioners.
meanings.sent3: The group of questioners at the museum tour were full of curiosity.
meanings.sent4: The questioners on the internet searched for answers to their queries.
meanings.sent5: The questioners in the focus group provided valuable feedback for the product development team.
